violations.excerpt: name does not meet format requirements

discussion.author: GordStephen
discussion.text: Note that the automerge checks won't pass because of the package name, but consensus in https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/120172 and https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/120786 seems to be that we can get an exception for this? [noblock]

discussion.author: GordStephen
discussion.text:
Whoops, looks like we're missing compat bounds for Reexport, let me fix that. [noblock]

Update: fixed
